abstract: Rebecca Skloot will write about the bonds between people and animals.
snippet: Rebecca Skloot will write about the bonds between people and animals.
lead_paragraph: Rebecca Skloot, the veterinary technician-turned-author whose nonfiction book "The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks" has not budged from the paperback best-seller list in 30 weeks, will write a new book focusing on the bonds between people and animals, her publisher said on Wednesday. The new book, currently untitled, will be released by Crown Publishers, part of Random House.

headline.main: New Book Coming From Author of 'Henrietta Lacks'
